verses.verse: כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus הִרְאַ֖נִי <S%H7200><s%> shewed אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> Thus hath the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD וְהִנֵּ֖ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold כְּל֥וּב <S%H3619><s%> unto me and behold a basket קָֽיִץ׃ <S%H7019><s%> of summer fruit

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said מָֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> What אַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> you רֹאֶה֙ <S%H7200><s%> what seest עָמ֔וֹס <S%H5986><s%> Amos וָאֹמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> thou? And I said כְּל֣וּב <S%H3619><s%> A basket קָ֑יִץ <S%H7019><s%> of summer fruit וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> about בָּ֤א <S%H935><s%> is come הַקֵּץ֙ <S%H7093><s%> unto me The end אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about עַמִּ֣י <S%H5971><s%> upon my people יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no אוֹסִ֥יף <S%H3254><s%> I will not again ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again עֲב֥וֹר <S%H5674><s%> pass לֽוֹ׃

וְהֵילִ֜ילוּ <S%H3213><s%> shall be howlings שִׁיר֤וֹת <S%H7892><s%> And the songs הֵיכָל֙ <S%H1964><s%> of the temple בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in that day הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> GOD רַ֣ב <S%H7227><s%> [there shall be] many הַפֶּ֔גֶר <S%H6297><s%> dead bodies בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every מָק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> in every place הִשְׁלִ֥יךְ <S%H7993><s%> they shall cast [them] forth הָֽס׃ <S%H2013><s%> with silence פ

שִׁמְעוּ־ <S%H8085><s%> Hear זֹ֕את <S%H2063><s%> who הַשֹּׁאֲפִ֖ים <S%H7602><s%> this O ye that swallow up אֶבְי֑וֹן <S%H34><s%> the needy וְלַשְׁבִּ֖ית <S%H7673><s%> to fail [עַנְוֵי־ כ] (עֲנִיֵּי־ <S%H6035><s%> humble אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H6041><s%> the humble ק)

לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> Saying מָתַ֞י <S%H4970><s%> When יַעֲבֹ֤ר <S%H5674><s%> be gone הַחֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H2320><s%> When will the new moon וְנַשְׁבִּ֣ירָה <S%H7666><s%> that we may sell שֶּׁ֔בֶר <S%H7668><s%> grain וְהַשַּׁבָּ֖ת <S%H7676><s%> and the sabbath וְנִפְתְּחָה־ <S%H6605><s%> that we may set forth בָּ֑ר <S%H1250><s%> wheat לְהַקְטִ֤ין <S%H6994><s%> small אֵיפָה֙ <S%H374><s%> making the ephah וּלְהַגְדִּ֣יל <S%H1431><s%> great שֶׁ֔קֶל <S%H8255><s%> and the shekel וּלְעַוֵּ֖ת <S%H5791><s%> and falsifying מֹאזְנֵ֥י <S%H3976><s%> the balances מִרְמָֽה׃ <S%H4820><s%> dishonest

לִקְנ֤וֹת <S%H7069><s%> That we may buy בַּכֶּ֙סֶף֙ <S%H3701><s%> for silver דַּלִּ֔ים <S%H1800><s%> the poor וְאֶבְי֖וֹן <S%H34><s%> and the needy בַּעֲב֣וּר <S%H5668><s%> because of נַעֲלָ֑יִם <S%H5275><s%> for a pair of shoes וּמַפַּ֥ל <S%H4651><s%> the refuse בַּ֖ר <S%H1250><s%> corn נַשְׁבִּֽיר׃ <S%H7666><s%> [yea] and sell

נִשְׁבַּ֥ע <S%H7650><s%> hath sworn יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD בִּגְא֣וֹן <S%H1347><s%> by the excellency יַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Indeed אֶשְׁכַּ֥ח <S%H7911><s%> forget לָנֶ֖צַח <S%H5331><s%> Surely I will never כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any מַעֲשֵׂיהֶֽם׃ <S%H4639><s%> any of their works

הַ֤עַל <S%H5921><s%> Because זֹאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> likewise לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תִרְגַּ֣ז <S%H7264><s%> tremble הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> Shall not the land וְאָבַ֖ל <S%H56><s%> for this and every one mourn כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and everyone יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> that dwelleth בָּ֑הּ וְעָלְתָ֤ה <S%H5927><s%> therein? and it shall rise up כָאֹר֙ <S%H2975><s%> wholly as a flood כֻּלָּ֔הּ <S%H3605><s%> and everyone וְנִגְרְשָׁ֥ה <S%H1644><s%> and it shall be cast out [וְנִשְׁקָה כ] (וְנִשְׁקְעָ֖ה <S%H8257><s%> make deep ק) כִּיא֥וֹר <S%H2975><s%> the Nile מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt ס

וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <S%H1961><s%> will come בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he נְאֻם֙ <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD וְהֵבֵאתִ֥י <S%H935><s%> to go down הַשֶּׁ֖מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> that I will cause the sun בַּֽצָּהֳרָ֑יִם <S%H6672><s%> at noon וְהַחֲשַׁכְתִּ֥י <S%H2821><s%> and I will darken לָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day אֽוֹר׃ <S%H216><s%> in the clear

וְהָפַכְתִּ֨י <S%H2015><s%> And I will turn חַגֵּיכֶ֜ם <S%H2282><s%> your feasts לְאֵ֗בֶל <S%H60><s%> into mourning וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all שִֽׁירֵיכֶם֙ <S%H7892><s%> and all your songs לְקִינָ֔ה <S%H7015><s%> into lamentation וְהַעֲלֵיתִ֤י <S%H5927><s%> and I will bring up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> everyone's מָתְנַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4975><s%> upon all loins שָׂ֔ק <S%H8242><s%> sackcloth וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every רֹ֖אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> upon every head קָרְחָ֑ה <S%H7144><s%> and baldness וְשַׂמְתִּ֙יהָ֙ <S%H7760><s%> and I will make כְּאֵ֣בֶל <S%H60><s%> it as the mourning יָחִ֔יד <S%H3173><s%> of an only וְאַחֲרִיתָ֖הּ <S%H319><s%> [son] and the end כְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day מָֽר׃ <S%H4751><s%> thereof as a bitter

הִנֵּ֣ה ׀ <S%H2009><s%> Behold יָמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> Behold the days בָּאִ֗ים <S%H935><s%> come נְאֻם֙ <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD וְהִשְׁלַחְתִּ֥י <S%H7971><s%> that I will send רָעָ֖ב <S%H7458><s%> a famine בָּאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Not רָעָ֤ב <S%H7458><s%> not a famine לַלֶּ֙חֶם֙ <S%H3899><s%> of bread וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> or צָמָ֣א <S%H6772><s%> nor a thirst לַמַּ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> for water כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> for לִשְׁמֹ֔עַ <S%H8085><s%> but of hearing אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> the words יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וְנָעוּ֙ <S%H5128><s%> And they shall wander מִיָּ֣ם <S%H3220><s%> from sea עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against יָ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> to sea וּמִצָּפ֖וֹן <S%H6828><s%> and from the north וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> even מִזְרָ֑ח <S%H4217><s%> even to the east יְשֽׁוֹטְט֛וּ <S%H7751><s%> they shall run to and fro לְבַקֵּ֥שׁ <S%H1245><s%> to seek אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> they will not יִמְצָֽאוּ׃ <S%H4672><s%> and shall not find

בַּיּ֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> In that day הַה֜וּא <S%H1931><s%> he תִּ֠תְעַלַּפְנָה <S%H5968><s%> faint הַבְּתוּלֹ֧ת <S%H1330><s%> virgins הַיָּפ֛וֹת <S%H3303><s%> shall the fair וְהַבַּחוּרִ֖ים <S%H970><s%> and young men בַּצָּמָֽא׃ <S%H6772><s%> for thirst

הַנִּשְׁבָּעִים֙ <S%H7650><s%> They that swear בְּאַשְׁמַ֣ת <S%H819><s%> by the sin שֹֽׁמְר֔וֹן <S%H8111><s%> of Samaria וְאָמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> and say חֵ֤י <S%H2416><s%> liveth אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> Thy god דָּ֔ן <S%H1835><s%> O Dan וְחֵ֖י <S%H2416><s%> liveth דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> and The manner בְּאֵֽר־ שָׁ֑בַע <S%H884><s%> of Beersheba וְנָפְל֖וּ <S%H5307><s%> even they shall fall וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and not יָק֥וּמוּ <S%H6965><s%> and never rise up עֽוֹד׃ <S%H5750><s%> again ס
